name: AI_MainTask_CreateCreatures
documentation: Creates given soldier types on given position.

parameters.name: ConditionId
parameters.documentation: Command is only active if the condition is true.

parameters.name: MissionId
parameters.documentation: Id for the generated soldiers to control via missions.

parameters.name: Unknown
parameters.documentation: Should be 1. Longer: (Un)known or not? But 'most likely wrong outcome if not `1` -- Molt'
